attributes.comment:
Please do not pass this regulation. As a family currently going through an
international adoption, the costs are already high enough. We (the families that
have adopted, are adopting and thinking of adopting) have so many hurdles to go
over that changing these fees will just add to the stress that we already have to go
through. Increasing these costs may make the difference between adopting a
child and creating a family, or foregoing adoption for many families. Please
reconsider this regulation and the effects that it will have on the many people who
are considering adoption as the only means to have a family.
Thank you

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Sara B. Moore
